thread.title: U.S. Treasurys Strengthen After Disappointing Retail Sales Report

author: wsjcom
title: U.S. Treasurys Strengthen After Disappointing Retail Sales Report
text:
U.S. government bond prices notched their third straight advance Wednesday after data showed retail sales unexpectedly slipped in February, hinting at some slowdown in economic momentum early on in the year.
Yields, which fall as bond prices rise, declined following the Commerce Departmentâ€™s retail report, with the yield on the benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasury note settling at 2.815%, according to Tradeweb, compared with 2.848% Tuesday.
...
